qas.question: What body did the Marshall Islands join in 2007?
What is the significance of the Marshall Islands joining the International Labour Organization?

answers.text: its labour laws will comply with international benchmarks

qas.question: What may see benefits from the Marshalls joining the International Labour Organization?

context: In 2007, the Marshall Islands joined <a0_0>the International Labour Organization<a0_0/>, which means <a1_0>its labour laws will comply with international benchmarks<a1_0/>. This may impact <a2_0>business conditions<a2_0/> in the islands.
